text: Jack Crawford Taylor (April 14, 1922 - July 2, 2016) was an American businessman, philanthropist and billionaire. He founded the Enterprise Rent-A- Car Company. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He was worth a US$8.6 billion as of February 2016.Forbes: The World's Billionaires - Jack Taylor & Family September 2013 Taylor died on July 2, 2016 in St. Louis, Missouri, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== *Forbes.com: Forbes 400 Richest Americans (2006) *Fortune.com: How father & son built a company known for excellent customer service *Washington University in St. Louis Magazine: A Man on a Mission Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:Philanthropists from Missouri Category:Businesspeople from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Jack C. Taylor
